title: Roller Coaster
lyrics:
I remember very first time in love
I remember oh oh
I remember oh oh
Neodo gat-eun gibun-ilkka so I'm in love
I remember oh oh
I remember oh~



Eomeo ilaedo doeneunji sip-eo (aha~)

Geulae neo ttaemun-e maeil jeulgeowo



Jogeum seoduleuneun geos gat-ado baby

I need your love oh oh

I need your love oh oh oh~



Simjang-i hug naelyeoanjge dalkomhae

Gakkeum-eun sangcheobad-eulkka geogjeongdwae

Cheoeumbuteo modeun geol al sun eobsgessji

Hajiman nan da deonjyeobollae



Jakku ajjilhan i neukkim

Wiheomhan i neukkim

Nae son-eul kkog jab-ajwo I want you

Heundeulliji anhge jogeum deo tteugeobge

Naleul kkog deo an-ajwo



Neon lolleokoseuteo ooh ahh ~

Lolleokoseuteouh woh ahh~

I need your love ooh ahh ~

Baby your love uh woh ahh~



Ppanhi balabol ttae gaseum-i tteollyeo

Anin cheog haebwado ppeonhi da geollyeo

Naega meonjeo malhaji anh-ado imi da al-a

Neon nae mamgwa gat-a (aha~)



Neomu ppaleun geon anilkka sip-eo (aha~)

Geunde neo ttaemun-e maeil saelowo



Jogeum seotulleodo nun gam-ajwo baby

I need your love oh oh

I need your love oh oh oh~



Sigan-i meomchun geoscheoleom dalkomhae

Gabjagi nal tteonalkka bwa geogjeongdwae

Cheoeumbuteo modeun geol al sun eobsgessji

Hajiman nan da deonjyeobollae



Jakku ajjilhan i neukkim

Wiheomhan i neukkim

Nae son-eul kkog jab-ajwo I want you

Heundeulliji anhge jogeum deo tteugeobge

Naleul kkog deo an-ajwo



Neon lolleokoseuteoooh ahh ~

Lolleokoseuteouh woh ahh~

I need your love ooh ahh~

Baby your love uh woh ahh~



Eojjeoda chaj-aon nae salang

I love you I love you ~

Modeun ge kkum-i anigileul

I love you I love you ~



Look



Neon lolleokoseuteoooh ahh ~

(neon lolleokoseuteo baby~)

Lolleokoseuteouh woh ahh~

(lolleokoseuteo baby~)

I need your love ooh ahh ~

(baby I need you love)

Baby your love uh woh ahh~



Lolleokoseuteo!

Lolleokoseuteo!
